doc.title: Reflections on a Spacewalk - NASA
doc.description: The Earth's horizon and the Shuttle Discovery are reflected in a spacewalking astronaut's visor during the STS-103 mission in December 1999. Discovery will return the Space Shuttle fleet to flight in May with the launch of the STS-114 mission.

main.p: The Earth’s horizon and the Shuttle Discovery are reflected in a spacewalking astronaut’s visor during the STS-103 mission in December 1999. Discovery will return the Space Shuttle fleet to flight in May with the launch of the STS-114 mission.Image Credit:NASA/KSC
